alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 10:41AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Henderson, southeastern Gibson, western Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1041 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairview, or 9 miles northeast of Jackson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Lexington, Huntingdon, Fairview, Three Way, Atwood, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Wildersville, Bemis, Parkers Crossroads, Carroll, Medina, Trezevant, Gibson, Clarksburg, McLemoresville and Hickory Flat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
